mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: DanceTwin was created to make dance learning accessible to everyone. We believe that anyone can learn to dance with the right tools and feedback.

step1.title: AI Pose Detection
step1.description: We use MediaPipe's advanced pose estimation to track 33 key points on your body in real-time.

step2.title: Movement Comparison
step2.description: Your movements are compared against the teacher video, analyzing angles and positions.

step3.title: Instant Feedback
step3.description: Get real-time scores and hints to improve your technique as you practice.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your video never leaves your device.

team.title: Built with Love
team.description: DanceTwin is an open project built for dancers by technology enthusiasts who love dance.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
